title: Mattel Earnings: What to Watch
text:
Mattel Earnings: What to Watch Results come as company pushes turnaround efforts By Cassandra Jaramillo July 16, 2015 11:48 a.m. ET 
Mattel Inc., the maker of Barbie, Hot Wheels and Fisher-Price toys, is scheduled to report second-quarter earnings after the bell on Thursday. 
Chief Executive Christopher Sinclair, who took the helm permanently in April after being named interim chief in January, has vowed to change the companyâ€™s culture and recently reshuffled duties of... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
